<!--- Fonts --->

\newcommand{\B}[1]{\boldsymbol{#1}}

<!--- Sets --->

\newcommand{\CC}{\mathbb{C}}
\newcommand{\RR}{\mathbb{R}}
\newcommand{\Rp}{\mathbb{R}_{\geq 0}}
\newcommand{\NN}{\mathbb{N}}

<!--- Special Characters --->

\newcommand{\ii}{\mathrm{i}}
\newcommand{\II}{\mathcal{I}}
\newcommand{\eps}{\varepsilon}
\newcommand{\Bee}{\boldsymbol{\mathrm{e}}}

<!--- Functions --->

\newcommand{\sgn}[1]{\mathrm{sign}\left( #1 \right)}
\newcommand{\Cos}[1]{\cos \left( #1 \right)}
\newcommand{\Sin}[1]{\sin \left( #1 \right)}
\newcommand{\ex}[1]{\mathrm{e}^{#1}}
\newcommand{\argmin}[1]{\underset{#1}{\mathrm{argmin}}}

<!--- Linear Algebra --->

\newcommand{\Mat}[1]{\begin{pmatrix} #1 \end{pmatrix}}
\newcommand{\mat}[1]{\begin{matrix} #1 \end{matrix}}
\newcommand{\EP}[2]{\left\{ #1 \; ; \; \begin{pmatrix} #2 \end{pmatrix} \right\}}
\newcommand{\Tr}[1]{{#1}^{\mathrm{T}}}
\newcommand{\He}[1]{{#1}^{\mathrm{H}}}

<!--- Spacing --->

\newcommand{\qiq}{\quad \implies \quad}
\newcommand{\iq}{\implies \quad}
\newcommand{\qtq}[1]{\quad \text{#1} \quad}
\newcommand{\tq}[1]{\text{#1} \quad}
\newcommand{\negquad}{\! \! \! \! \! \!}

<!--- Arrows --->

\newcommand{\rarrow}[1]{\xrightarrow[#1]{}}
\newcommand{\textimplies}[1]{\quad \underset{\text{\tiny{#1}}}{\Rightarrow} \quad}
\newcommand{\mathimplies}[1]{\quad \underset{#1}{\Rightarrow} \quad}

<!--- Brackets --->

\newcommand{\nbr}[1]{\left( #1 \right)}
\newcommand{\sbr}[1]{\left[ #1 \right]}
\newcommand{\cbr}[1]{\left\{ #1 \right\}}
\newcommand{\abr}[1]{\langle #1 \rangle}
\newcommand{\abs}[1]{\left| #1 \right|}
\newcommand{\INorm}[1]{|| #1 ||_{\infty}}

<!--- Calculus --->

\newcommand{\pdiff}[2]{\frac{\partial #1}{\partial #2}}
\newcommand{\Pdiff}[3]{\frac{\partial^{#3} #1}{\partial #2^{#3}}}

\newcommand{\odiff}[2]{\frac{\mathrm{d} #1}{\mathrm{d} #2}}
\newcommand{\Odiff}[3]{\frac{\mathrm{d}^{#3} #1}{\mathrm{d} #2^{#3}}}

\newcommand{\tdiff}[1]{\frac{\mathrm{d} #1}{\mathrm{d} t}}
\newcommand{\Tdiff}[2]{\frac{\mathrm{d}^{#2} #1}{\mathrm{d} t^{#2}}}

\newcommand{\Bdiff}[2]{\frac{\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{#1}}{\mathrm{d} #2}}
\newcommand{\Btdiff}[1]{\frac{\mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{#1}}{\mathrm{d} t}}

\newcommand{\Integ}[2]{\int \! #1 \; \mathrm{d} #2}
\newcommand{\integ}[4]{\int\limits_{#1}^{#2} \! #3 \; \mathrm{d} #4}

<!--- Misc --->

\newcommand{\OO}[1]{\mathcal{O}\left(#1\right)}
\newcommand{\nth}[1]{{#1}^{\mathrm{th}}}
\newcommand{\E}[1]{\times 10^{#1}}
